result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Telephone scheduling conference on November 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Notice from employer Nicholas is on a Leave of Absence as of 9/7/22.

Telephone scheduling conference on September 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim.  AMENDED 7/29/22: Contact may be allowed ONLY in a therapeutic setting and ONLY with permission of Dodge County Human Services.

8:15 AM Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic appeared by phone.  Attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Joseph Francis Fischer Aty appeared by phone for Nicholas S Fergelic. Victim Rights Compliant. Attorney Fischer's heard in regards to motion for bond modification. Court heard. Attorney Tienstra heard on State's position in regards to motion. Court heard. Discussion held. Court grants Bond Modification to state that, contact may be allowed ONLY in a therapeutic setting and ONLY with permission of Dodge County Human Services.
Letter from Atty Fischer
Motion hearing on July 29, 2022 at 08:15 am.

1:05 PM Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic appeared by phone. Jennifer Novopny, from Attorney Fischer's office appeared by phone on behalf of Attorney Fischer.  Attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews status of case. Attorney Fischer stuck in court in another County. Matter will be adjourned until next week.
Motion hearing scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Letter from Atty Fischer
Order on Arraignment

8:31 AM Prosecuting attorney Yolanda Tienstra in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic in court.  Attorney Joseph Francis Fischer Aty in court for Nicholas S Fergelic. Review of info is waived; not guilty plea entered; 20 days mtns; tsc set; bail con't. Bond Motion also set for today. Atty Fischer heard on Motion. ADA Tienstra heard; objects, requests more time to talk to DHS. Discussion held. Court resets Bond Motion Hearing.
Motion hearing on July 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Motion hearing on June 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Arraignment on June 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: 8:31 AM Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic in court.  Attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Joseph Francis Fischer Aty in court for Nicholas S Fergelic. Court advises parties of conflict, previously represented defendant's wife and possibly a witness in the complaint.  Attorney Fischer has no objection.  Attorney Tienstra request court recuse itself.  Court heard, will recuse itself.

8:34 AM Prosecuting attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic in court.  Attorney Joseph Francis Fischer Aty in court for Nicholas S Fergelic. Court reviews prelim waiver;
Arraignment scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

re bond motion

8:17 AM Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic in court. Discussion held. Court appoints Atty Joe Fischer at rate of $25/wk through wage assignment starting 5/1/22.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with alleged victim. Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone. No use of corporal punishment.

1:03 PM Prosecuting attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Nicholas S Fergelic appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alyssa F. George appeared by video for Nicholas S Fergelic (jail only, SPD conflict); Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. Court finds probable cause. State heard on bond; Atty. George response; Prelim requested waiving time limits. Prelim 5/12/22 at 8:30am in Br. 1 & Review 4/20/22 at 8:15am in Br. 4; Court sets $10,000 PA Bond with conditions: Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with alleged Victim. Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone. No use of corporal punishment.
